name: FundersClub
headline: Online VC
description: FundersClub discovers, funds, and supports the world's best technology startups. FundersClub created the first online venture capital platform and invests starting at Seed, following on through Growth. The portfolio includes Coinbase, Instacart, Webflow, GitLab, Flexport, Rippling, and other category-defining companies.

founders.name: Alex Mittal, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Startup founder. Startup investor. Co-Founder & CEO, FundersClub. Managing Director, FCVC.

  * ![Instacart](https://d288gf2k0wd772.cloudfront.net/static/img/graphics/public-pages/instacart.966f4f26ce13.svg)
**Instacart** On-demand grocery delivery. First funded Seed round in 2013. Raised $650M to date from Sequoia Capital, Andreessen Horowitz, Kleiner Perkins, and Khosla Ventures. 
  * ![Coinbase](https://d288gf2k0wd772.cloudfront.net/static/img/graphics/public-pages/coinbase.1c0dde4f338e.svg)
**Coinbase** Buy and sell digital currency. First funded Seed round in 2012. Raised $205M to date from IVP, Greylock, Andreessen Horowitz, USV, DFJ Growth, NYSE, and USAA. 
  * ![Flexport](https://d288gf2k0wd772.cloudfront.net/static/img/graphics/public-pages/flexport.59d497066dff.png)
**Flexport** Freight forwarder for the Internet age. First funded Seed round in 2014. Raised $204M to date from DST Global, Founders Fund, First Round Capital, and A-Grade. 
  * ![Gitlab](https://d288gf2k0wd772.cloudfront.net/static/img/graphics/public-pages/gitlab.90874737bd7b.png)
**GitLab** Complete DevOps platform, delivered as a single application. First funded Seed round in 2015. Raised >$400M to date from ICONIQ Capital, Khosla Ventures, and Goldman Sachs. 


#  Invest in the world’s most promising startups 
Diversify your investment portfolio with insider access to highly vetted startups from Silicon Valley and beyond in just minutes. 
[ Join FundersClub for Free ](https://fundersclub.com/</accounts/signup/>)
You must be an accredited member to invest 
380+ 
Startups Funded 
$185M+ 
Invested on FundersClub 
$30B+ 
Portfolio Valuation 
![](https://d288gf2k0wd772.cloudfront.net/static/img/graphics/public-pages/online.0c7fbeb505b5.svg)
##  Online venture capital 
FundersClub became the first online VC firm in March 2012. We are proud to have invested in the top 1-2% of the companies we review, representing the world's most promising startups. 
Our portfolio companies have gone on to raise $6B+ of follow on capital from other leading venture capital firms. They are currently valued at more than $30B. 
[ Learn about FundersClub ](https://fundersclub.com/</about/>)
##  Join our community 
The FundersClub community represents a diverse set of highly accomplished business and technology leaders. We invest in each other, and our community makes us all stronger. 
Learn about startup investing, stay current with tech trends, meet like-minded individuals, find your dream startup job, and learn as part of our connected community of movers and shakers. 
[ Learn about community ](https://fundersclub.com/</community/>)
![](https://d288gf2k0wd772.cloudfront.net/static/img/graphics/public-pages/community.a31a2fb71de0.svg)
##  Start investing today 
FundersClub is focused on discovering, funding, and supporting the world’s most promising startups. Fewer than 2% of the startups we review are made available for investment on FundersClub. 
Gain access to, review, and invest in the best startups via our web and mobile-enabled startup investing platform. After investing, keep up to date with news, updates and portfolio analysis features. Easily diversify your portfolio with low minimums. 
[ Learn about how it works ](https://fundersclub.com/</how-it-works/>)
![](https://d288gf2k0wd772.cloudfront.net/static/img/graphics/public-pages/invest.a8fbe8566256.svg)
  * > “Software is eating the world; FundersClub is eating venture capital.”  Matt Weinberger, Sr. Tech Reporter, Business Insider 
  * > “FundersClub tops a recent ranking of venture firms with the most momentum..."  Laura Baverman, Entrepreneurs Columnist, USA TODAY 


[ ![Business Insider](https://d288gf2k0wd772.cloudfront.net/static/img/graphics/public-pages/business-insider.34994134313e.png) ](https://fundersclub.com/<#>) [ ![USA Today](https://d288gf2k0wd772.cloudfront.net/static/img/graphics/public-pages/usa-today.4fa0c7cf42b1.png) ](https://fundersclub.com/<#>)
##  Invest alongside top investors 
![Andreessen Horowitz](https://d288gf2k0wd772.cloudfront.net/static/img/graphics/public-pages/follow-on/andreessen-horowitz.e2853c78754a.png) ![Union Square Ventures](https://d288gf2k0wd772.cloudfront.net/static/img/graphics/public-pages/follow-on/usv.0c81248df9a9.png) ![First Round Capital](https://d288gf2k0wd772.cloudfront.net/static/img/graphics/public-pages/follow-on/first-round.59f3a3ff44ff.png) ![Kleiner Perkins Caufield Byers](https://d288gf2k0wd772.cloudfront.net/static/img/graphics/public-pages/follow-on/kpcb.3b9580e3ca5d.png) ![Sequoia Capital](https://d288gf2k0wd772.cloudfront.net/static/img/graphics/public-pages/follow-on/sequoia.596587886fdd.png)
##  Raise with FundersClub 
We leverage software and a powerful, global network to provide you with an unfair advantage on your startup journey. 
[ Apply to Fundraise ](https://fundersclub.com/</founders/apply/>)
##  Not ready to fundraise? 
The free FundersClub Catalyst tools, apps, and content are available to all founders. Do more with less and reach your next milestone. 
[ View FundersClub Catalyst ](https://fundersclub.com/</catalyst/>)
![Laura Behrens Wu](https://d288gf2k0wd772.cloudfront.net/static/img/graphics/portraits/laura-wu.f98249ef4f0a.jpg)
"FundersClub is not just an investor, they’ve been a great partner for us… They understand what founders are going through, making them truly founder-friendly." 
Laura Behrens Wu 
Portfolio Company Founder CEO, Shippo 
![Tim Draper](https://d288gf2k0wd772.cloudfront.net/static/img/graphics/portraits/tim-draper.4ee5f8b08513.jpg)
"I am thrilled with what FundersClub is doing for entrepreneurship and venture capital." 
Tim Draper 
Venture Capitalist Founder, DFJ 
![Apoorva Mehta](https://d288gf2k0wd772.cloudfront.net/static/img/graphics/portraits/apoorva-mehta.f09582fee406.jpg)
"They invested in Instacart very very early before it was clear to most of the investment community that we could be a sizable business." 
Apoorva Mehta 
Portfolio Company Founder CEO, Instacart 
![Josh Kopelman](https://d288gf2k0wd772.cloudfront.net/static/img/graphics/portraits/josh-kopelman.fbca7d150e25.jpg)
"As someone who spends over 30 hours a month on planes/trains, I know how hard it is to stay connected and get access to the strongest startups. What FundersClub provides for everyone, is insider access." 
Josh Kopelman 
Venture Capitalist Founder, First Round Capital 
![Landon Thorne](https://d288gf2k0wd772.cloudfront.net/static/img/graphics/portraits/landon-thorne.82bec899aa90.jpg)
"FundersClub’s great client support team and continual system improvement make for an exceptional user experience and an excellent platform that works as well for the experienced investor as for the novice" 
Landon Thorne 
FundersClub Member Founder, Midas Advisory Group 
![Jonathan Chizick](https://d288gf2k0wd772.cloudfront.net/static/img/graphics/portraits/jonathan-chizick.540654d020fe.jpg)
"FundersClub gives me access to the top startups, many of which I would have no other way to invest in. Their high level of professional curation and screening consistently delivers strong performing investment opportunities." 
Jonathan Chizick 
FundersClub Member Angel Investor 
![Brian Armstrong](https://d288gf2k0wd772.cloudfront.net/static/img/graphics/portraits/brian-armstrong.3a638e82f536.jpg)
"Coinbase might not be here without FundersClub--they did half our seed round during a time when fundraising was tough. This was before Union Square, Andreessen, and DFJ. Working with FC was a big win for us in the early days and they had a lot of foresight vs the rest of the market." 
Brian Armstrong 
Portfolio Company Founder CEO, Coinbase 
[ Join FundersClub for Free ](https://fundersclub.com/</accounts/signup/>)

generated_description:
**FundersClub: A New Era in Venture Capital**

Founded in 2012 as part of Y Combinator’s Batch S12, FundersClub is revolutionizing the way venture capital operates by providing online access to funding some of the world’s most promising startups. Based in San Francisco, with a lean team of just five employees, the company holds the distinction of being the first online venture capital firm, inviting accredited investors to join its community and gain insider access to tech startups.

**Mission and Vision:**
FundersClub's mission is straightforward—discover, fund, and support the best technology startups across the globe. With a keen focus on early-stage investing, the company primarily engages in Seed rounds and follows up through Growth stages. The portfolio boasts a fantastic lineup of category-defining companies, including Coinbase, Instacart, Webflow, GitLab, and Flexport, among others.

**Investment Stats:**
- **Total Startups Funded:** 380+
- **Total Capital Invested:** $185M+
- **Portfolio Valuation:** Over $30B.

What’s particularly striking is that only the top 1-2% of startups reviewed by FundersClub make it onto their platform, which translates to high-quality investment opportunities for those who join. Portfolio companies have collectively raised over $6B in follow-on capital, a strong indicator of their growth potential.

**What They Offer:**
FundersClub doesn’t just connect investors with startups; they also provide a wealth of resources for both investors and founders. This includes a blog, an education center, and networking events designed to keep everyone at the forefront of tech trends and venture capital best practices. Their online platform is designed for easy navigation and was created to allow investors to review and invest in hand-picked startups quickly.

**The Community Factor:**
Joining FundersClub means becoming part of a diverse and accomplished community of technology and business leaders. It's not just about money; it's about collaboration, learning, and growing together. The shared insights from this network can be as valuable as the investments themselves.

**Conclusion:**
FundersClub symbolizes a shift in the venture capital landscape—making it more accessible, less opaque, and deeply interconnected. Whether you're a seasoned investor or a budding founder, there's merit in exploring what this pioneering online venture capital platform has to offer. If you’d like a closer look, check out their website at [FundersClub.com](https://fundersclub.com/).
